attributes.action: Ban Footballers from being paid over 5,000 a week
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The amount of money paid to professional footballers each week is ludicrous (up to £200,000). Millions of people are struggling to earn the minimum wage whilst many footballers are being paid extortionate amounts of money simply for playing a game.
Just think what could be done if this money was invested in making environmental changes, medical research and helping those who are deprived or ill.
